tiles.description: Off-white marble with subtle gray veining; 2-3px clusters, low-contrast veining
Subtle single hairline crack (2-4px wide), tiles cleanly
Dark marble for borders/inlays; readable but not solid black
Stone trim edge facing North; 1-2px highlight on top
Interior stone wall - top face + tiny vertical lip, top-down wallcap style
Wood panel wall - subtle vertical grain, no hard AA
Double wood door closed - top-down threshold + door top edge, brass kickplate hint
Double wood door open - dark void + jamb shading, walkable
Column capital - 2-3 shade steps for depth, not fat
Rich red rug with subtle Greek key/courthouse pattern, seamless
Blue rug for chambers/cafeteria committee room vibe
Marble mosaic medallion feel; subtle center motif
Marble step with lip - consistent 'up direction' shading
Flat landing tile that blends to floor
Brass post + red rope nub for queue lines
Marble bench left segment (3 tiles wide total)
Information desk corner with papers (2-3px clusters)
Narrow runner carpet border edge North
Wall sconce left - soft glow implied by lighter halo pixels, no blur
Warm wood planks; plank seams every ~6-8px; 2-3 shade steps
Wood border edge North for dais/seating
Judicial bench front left - visible front paneling + top lip
Judicial bench top left - tiny black mic dots
Judicial bench top middle with gavel spot
Single metal locker from top-down; vent slits as 2-px dashes
Locker bank left for wider runs
Coat rack with hooks + 1 hanging robe silhouette
Mirror tile: highlight edge, stylized sheen, no reflections
Darker carpet to contrast equipment; subtle pattern
Tripod legs triangular footprint; camera as small box
Light head with bright face; limited highlight, no glow blur
Vault wall with rivet clusters aligned to tile edges
Big round vault door from top-down; simplified wheel spokes
Vault door open - dark opening + door edge
Metal shelf top for stackable vertical shelves
Cardboard box with lid; label area as 2-3px light rectangle
Folder with black redaction bars - funny and readable
Scholar vibe but playful green rug
Bookcase inner corner for wall turns
Book spine variant A - prevent repetition
Reading table 2x2 NW corner - consistent wood grain
Library reading chair with green cushion
Light checker or speckle; variants don't create visible seams
Serving counter left with sneeze-guard highlight line
Grass edge blending to sidewalk North
Grass edge blending to sidewalk East
Grass edge blending to sidewalk South
Grass edge blending to sidewalk West
Slab seams aligned to tile edges
Exterior column top - cooler palette than interior
Flagpole base - pole implied extending up
2x2 desk NW corner - top surface with blotter
Different from library: fewer books, more folders
Window as floor decal near wall
Custom mug - text implied by 2-3px marks
Tiny clock prop - good for puzzles/timers
Simple plaque block for justice names
